data.comment: Today's referee, Andre Marriner, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 3, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Important block from the Southampton defence as Joao Moutinho fires in a strike for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 6, Wolverhampton pushes forward through Nelson Semedo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Leander Dendoncker for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Molineux Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 7, In Wolverhampton, Max Kilman (Wolverhampton) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 12, Southampton have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Southampton's Theo Walcott is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton at Molineux Stadium.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 24, Oriol Romeu (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Wolverhampton are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 26, Wolverhampton attack but Willy Boly's header doesn't find the target.
Andre Marriner awards Southampton a goal kick.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Southampton's Che Adams gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
In Wolverhampton Wolverhampton drive forward through Adama Traore. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Stuart Armstrong of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolverhampton.
Daniel Podence's header is off-target for Wolverhampton.
Goal kick for Southampton at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 33, Southampton push forward at Molineux Stadium and Che Adams gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In Wolverhampton, Rayan Ait-Nouri of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 35, Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 37, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a Southampton throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Southampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Marriner blows against Southampton's Theo Walcott for offside.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Southampton.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Southampton.
Ruben Neves (Wolverhampton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Adama Traore is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 48, Southampton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton advance rapidly upfield but Andre Marriner blows for offside.
Wolverhampton are pushing forward but Leander Dendoncker's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 51, Andre Marriner awards Southampton a goal kick.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolverhampton drives forward and Daniel Podence gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez misses with an attempt on goal.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 57, Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Goal! Theo Walcott gives Southampton a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 58, Che Adams instrumental with a fine assist.
Rayan Ait-Nouri has recovered and rejoins the match in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Southampton.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Wolverhampton to check on Rayan Ait-Nouri, who is grimacing with pain.
Adama Traore gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolverhampton.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 64, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Molineux Stadium.
Southampton are coming forward and Theo Walcott gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Southampton.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 67, Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez gets in a shot on goal at Molineux Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 68, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Southampton!
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 70, Nuno Espirito Santo (Wolverhampton) is making a first substitution, with Pedro Neto replacing Ruben Neves.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolverhampton's Pedro Neto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Wolverhampton just outside Southampton's area.
Wolverhampton's Max Kilman breaks free at Molineux Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, Andre Marriner awards Southampton a goal kick.
Wolverhampton drive into the zone and Raul Jimenez is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Pedro Neto gets an equalizer for Wolverhampton. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez has run offside.
In the minute 79, Ralph Hasenhuttl is making the team's first substitution at Molineux Stadium with Shane Long replacing Moussa Djenepo.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 83, Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
Pedro Neto of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Wolverhampton, Daniel Podence of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 84, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Daniel Podence with Vitinha.
Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Wolverhampton's area.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Wolverhampton.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Ibrahima Diallo is replacing Stuart Armstrong for the away team.
